examples: Any networking device for e.g. router, access point, extender, mesh router, Internet Gateway
Anything related to smart lights, switches, plugs, strips, window sensors, weather sensor, thermostat, garage door opener, smart lock, air purifier, vacuum etc

NAS, or anything that could store media which could be streamed somewhere over the network
DLNA DMS (Digital Media Server)
Any smart/IP camera, or smart doorbell
Any speaker based voice assistant, Nest Hub and Echo show,

Streamers, smart TVs, and voice assistant with display for e.g. DLNA DMR (Digital Media Renderer), also the case of both DMS and DMR, and any Receiver, smart speakers, and audio streamers, Internet radio device
Smart refridgerator, coffe maker, AC, purifier, fan, etc.
toothbrush, medical devices, and anything that doesn't fit in the above categories but it's and IoT.
